types:type.name: product
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type product = Array<{| id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, categories: Array<String>, colors: Array<String>, createdDate: String, modifiedDate: String, safetyStockLevel: Number {"typeId": "int"}, stock: Number {"typeId": "int"}, daysToManufacture: Number {"typeId": "int"}, name: String, description: String, images: Array<String>, listPrice: Number {"typeId": "int"}, manufactured: Boolean, productNumber: String, size: String, sizeUnitMeasureCode: Null, standardCost: Number {"typeId": "int"}, weightUnitMeasureCode: Null, weight: Null |}> {"example": "[{\\\"id\\\":1991,\\\"categories\\\":[\\\"\\\"],\\\"colors\\\":[\\\"\\\"],\\\"createdDate\\\":\\\"2025-01-01\\\",\\\"modifiedDate\\\":\\\"2025-01-01\\\",\\\"safetyStockLevel\\\":40,\\\"stock\\\":150,\\\"daysToManufacture\\\":2,\\\"name\\\":\\\"Windows XP software\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Software for computers\\\",\\\"images\\\":[\\\"\\\"],\\\"listPrice\\\":500,\\\"manufactured\\\":false,\\\"productNumber\\\":\\\"1110Z\\\",\\\"size\\\":\\\"112\\\",\\\"sizeUnitMeasureCode\\\":null,\\\"standardCost\\\":60,\\\"weightUnitMeasureCode\\\":null,\\\"weight\\\":null}]"}
